text: O'Brien sued, claiming he was terminated without cause, and both parties filed motions for summary judgment. The court of claims denied the motions because there was a factual dispute concerning what constituted a material breach under the employment contract.
title: Jim O'Brien was terminated from his position as head men's basketball coach at Ohio State University following the disclosure that he loaned a recruit's mother money.
